message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start to our negotiation!
You can do better than that!
Meet me in the middle, 50-50, no need to fight!
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy!
You're getting greedy, I'm getting serious! 40-60, take it or leave it!
You're getting closer to the edge, I'm just getting started!
Last chance, take 30 or walk away!
You're running out of time, I'm running out of patience!
Take it or leave it, I'm not getting any younger!
You're down to your last chance, don't expect any mercy!
Last stand, take 10 or I'll walk away with nothing!
You're going home with nothing, it was a pleasure playing with you!
